TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionScope extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class TransactionScope Implements IDisposable
public ref class TransactionScope sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 使程式碼區塊成為異動式。

span.span: Makes a code block transactional.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎結構所提供的明確程式設計模型為基礎類別，以及隱含程式設計模型使用類別，以自動管理交易由基礎結構。The infrastructure provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們建議您建立隱含的交易使用類別，以便為您自動管理環境交易內容。We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you. 您也應該使用和需要使用相同的異動，跨多個函式呼叫或多個執行緒呼叫的應用程式的類別。You should also use the and class for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls. 如需有關此模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如需有關如何撰寫交易式應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫交易式應用程式](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md). 在具現化由`new`陳述式中，交易管理員會決定要參與哪個交易。Upon instantiating a by the `new` statement, the transaction manager determines which transaction to participate in. 一旦決定後，範圍永遠會參與該異動。Once determined, the scope always participates in that transaction. 此決策是根據兩個因素而定：環境異動是否存在，以及建構函式中的 `TransactionScopeOption` 參數值。The decision is based on two factors: whether an ambient transaction is present and the value of the `TransactionScopeOption` parameter in the constructor. 環境交易是您的程式碼中執行的交易。The ambient transaction is the transaction your code executes in. 您可以呼叫 類別的靜態 屬性，取得環境交易的參考。You can obtain a reference to the ambient transaction by calling the static property of the class. 如需有關如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 交易流程管理 > 一節[實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on how this parameter is used, see the "Transaction Flow Management" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如果在異動範圍內不發生的任何例外狀況 (也就是之間的初始設定物件並呼叫其方法)，則範圍所參與的交易可以繼續。If no exception occurs within the transaction scope (that is, between the initialization of the object and the calling of its method), then the transaction in which the scope participates is allowed to proceed. 如果在異動範圍內，未發生例外狀況，它所參與的交易將會回復。If an exception does occur within the transaction scope, the transaction in which it participates will be rolled back. 當您的應用程式完成所有工作想要在交易中執行，您應該呼叫方法一次，以通知交易管理員可以接受認可交易。When your application completes all work it wants to perform in a transaction, you should call the method only once to inform that transaction manager that it is acceptable to commit the transaction. 無法呼叫這個方法會中止交易。Failing to call this method aborts the transaction. 呼叫方法會標記交易範圍的結尾。A call to the method marks the end of the transaction scope. 在呼叫這個方法後發生的例外狀況不太可能會影響異動。Exceptions that occur after calling this method may not affect the transaction. 如果您修改的值的範圍內發生例外狀況時擲回呼叫。If you modify the value of inside a scope, an exception is thrown when is called. 不過，在結束範圍時，會還原先前的值。However, at the end of the scope, the previous value is restored. 此外，如果您呼叫上的交易範圍內，建立交易，交易中止的範圍結尾。In addition, if you call on inside a transaction scope that created the transaction, the transaction aborts at the end of the scope. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來定義參與交易的程式碼區塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to define a block of code to participate in a transaction. [!code-csharp[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/cs/ScopeWithSQL.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/vb/ScopeWithSQL.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

related.span: 實作隱含交易使用交易範圍

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新的交易範圍的交易範圍選項等於。This constructor creates a new transaction scope with the transaction scope option equal to . 這表示交易需要新的範圍，而且如果已經存在，會使用環境交易。This means that a transaction is required by the new scope and the ambient transaction is used if one already exists. 否則會在進入範圍前建立新的交易。Otherwise, it creates a new transaction before entering the scope.

related.span: 實作隱含交易使用交易範圍

param.name: transactionToUse
param.span: 要設定為環境異動的異動，以便在範圍內執行的異動式工作使用這個異動。

param.span: 要設定為環境異動的異動，以便在範圍內執行的異動式工作使用這個異動。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Transactions.Transaction transactionToUse, valuetype System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption asyncFlowOption) cil managed
Public Sub New (transactionToUse As Transaction, asyncFlowOption As TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption)

param.name: transactionToUse
param.span: 要設定為環境異動的異動，以便在範圍內執行的異動式工作使用這個異動。

span.span: The transaction to be set as the ambient transaction, so that transactional work done inside the scope uses this transaction.

param.name: asyncFlowOption
param.span: 列舉執行個體，這個執行個體描述異動範圍相關聯的環境異動是否會在使用 Task 或 async/await .NET 非同步程式設計模式時，跨執行緒接續流動。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes whether the ambient transaction associated with the transaction scope will flow across thread continuations when using Task or async/await .NET async programming patterns.

Public Sub New (scopeOption As TransactionScopeOption, options As TransactionOptions)
Public Sub New (scopeOption As TransactionScopeOption, options As TransactionOptions)

param.name: scopeOption
param.span: 列舉的執行個體，會描述與此異動範圍有關聯的異動需求。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes the transaction requirements associated with this transaction scope.

param.name: transactionOptions
param.span: 結構，描述建立新異動時要使用的異動選項。

span.span: A structure that describes the transaction options to use if a new transaction is created.

param.span: 如果使用現有的異動，則這個參數中的逾時值會套用至異動範圍。

span.span: If an existing transaction is used, the timeout value in this parameter applies to the transaction scope.

param.span: 如果該時間在處置範圍之前過期，則會中止異動。

span.span: If that time expires before the scope is disposed, the transaction is aborted.

param.name: options
param.span: 結構，描述建立新異動時要使用的異動選項。

span.span: A structure that describes the transaction options to use if a new transaction is created.

param.span: 如果使用現有的異動，則這個參數中的逾時值會套用至異動範圍。

span.span: If an existing transaction is used, the timeout value in this parameter applies to the transaction scope.

param.span: 如果該時間在處置範圍之前過期，則會中止異動。

summary.span: 使用指定的需求，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用`transactionOptions`參數來指定，和範圍會建立異動之後，新的交易為指定的隔離層級相關聯。When you use the `transactionOptions` parameter to specify an , and the scope creates a transaction later, the new transaction is associated with the specified isolation level. 如果傳入的隔離等級以及交易，交易必須有相同的隔離等級，或擲回例外狀況。If an isolation level is passed in together with a transaction, the transaction must have an identical isolation level, or an exception is thrown.

related.span: 實作隱含交易使用交易範圍

span.span: A structure that describes the transaction options to use if a new transaction is created.

param.span: 如果使用現有的異動，則這個參數中的逾時值會套用至異動範圍。

span.span: If an existing transaction is used, the timeout value in this parameter applies to the transaction scope.

param.span: 如果該時間在處置範圍之前過期，則會中止異動。

span.span: If that time expires before the scope is disposed, the transaction is aborted.

param.name: options
param.span: 結構，描述建立新異動時要使用的異動選項。

span.span: A structure that describes the transaction options to use if a new transaction is created.

param.span: 如果使用現有的異動，則這個參數中的逾時值會套用至異動範圍。

span.span: If an existing transaction is used, the timeout value in this parameter applies to the transaction scope.

param.span: 如果該時間在處置範圍之前過期，則會中止異動。

span.span: If that time expires before the scope is disposed, the transaction is aborted.

param.name: interopOption
param.span: 列舉的執行個體，會描述關聯的異動如何與 COM+ 異動互動。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes how the associated transaction interacts with COM+ transactions.

param.name: opt
param.span: 列舉的執行個體，會描述關聯的異動如何與 COM+ 異動互動。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes how the associated transaction interacts with COM+ transactions.

summary.span: 使用指定的範圍和 COM+ 互通性需求，以及異動選項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scope and COM+ interoperability requirements, and transaction options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用`transactionOptions`參數來指定，和範圍會建立異動之後，新的交易為指定的隔離層級相關聯。When you use the `transactionOptions` parameter to specify an , and the scope creates a transaction later, the new transaction is associated with the specified isolation level. 如果傳入的隔離等級以及交易，交易必須有相同的隔離等級，或擲回例外狀況。If an isolation level is passed in together with a transaction, the transaction must have an identical isolation level, or an exception is thrown. **附註**這個方法會使用以防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 不過，只有立即呼叫端需要擁有`FullTrust`權限集合。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

related.span: 實作隱含交易使用交易範圍

remarks.format: ## Remarks **附註**這個方法會使用以防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 不過，只有立即呼叫端需要擁有`FullTrust`權限集合。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

Public Sub New (option As TransactionScopeOption, timeout As TimeSpan, asyncFlow As TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption)

param.name: scopeOption
param.span: 列舉的執行個體，會描述與此異動範圍有關聯的異動需求。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes the transaction requirements associated with this transaction scope.

param.span: 列舉的執行個體，會描述與此異動範圍有關聯的異動需求。

span.span: The after which the transaction scope times out and aborts the transaction.

param.name: asyncFlowOption
param.span: 列舉執行個體，這個執行個體描述異動範圍相關聯的環境異動是否會在使用 Task 或 async/await .NET 非同步程式設計模式時，跨執行緒接續流動。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes whether the ambient transaction associated with the transaction scope will flow across thread continuations when using Task or async/await .NET async programming patterns.

param.name: asyncFlow
param.span: 列舉執行個體，這個執行個體描述異動範圍相關聯的環境異動是否會在使用 Task 或 async/await .NET 非同步程式設計模式時，跨執行緒接續流動。

span.span: An instance of the enumeration that describes whether the ambient transaction associated with the transaction scope will flow across thread continuations when using Task or async/await .NET async programming patterns.

summary.span: 使用指定的逾時值、需求和非同步流程選項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified timeout value, requirements, and asynchronous flow option.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Complete() cil managed

summary.span: 表示範圍內的所有作業都已成功完成。

span.span: Indicates that all operations within the scope are completed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您滿意所做的範圍內的所有作業都順利都完成，您應該呼叫這個方法一次，以通知交易管理員，在所有資源的狀態一致，且可以認可交易。When you are satisfied that all operations within the scope are completed successfully, you should call this method only once to inform that transaction manager that the state across all resources is consistent, and the transaction can be committed. 它是很好的作法，以將呼叫中的最後一個陳述式`using`區塊。It is very good practice to put the call as the last statement in the `using` block. 如需有關如何使用此方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on how this method is used, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 無法呼叫這個方法會中止交易，，因為交易管理員會將此解譯系統失敗，或在交易範圍內擲回例外狀況。Failing to call this method aborts the transaction, because the transaction manager interprets this as a system failure, or exceptions thrown within the scope of transaction. 不過，您也應該注意，呼叫這個方法時，不保證交易的認可。However, you should also note that calling this method does not guarantee a commit of the transaction. 這只是將您的狀態告知異動管理員的方式。It is merely a way of informing the transaction manager of your status. 呼叫這個方法之後, 您就無法再存取環境交易透過屬性，並嘗試執行導致擲回例外狀況。After calling this method, you can no longer access the ambient transaction via the property, and trying to do so results in an exception being thrown. 資源管理員之間的認可的實際工作會發生在`End Using`陳述式如果建立交易物件。The actual work of commit between the resources manager happens at the `End Using` statement if the object created the transaction. 如果該物件沒有建立交易，則每當 物件的擁有者呼叫 時，便會發生認可。If it did not create the transaction, the commit occurs whenever is called by the owner of the object. 此時，交易管理員呼叫資源管理員，並說明認可或回復，根據上呼叫此方法是否物件。At that point the Transaction Manager calls the resource managers and informs them to either commit or rollback, based on whether this method was called on the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來定義參與交易的程式碼區塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to define a block of code to participate in a transaction. [!code-csharp[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/cs/ScopeWithSQL.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/vb/ScopeWithSQL.vb#1)]

exception.span: 已經呼叫這個方法一次。

span.span: This method has already been called once.

related.span: 實作隱含交易使用交易範圍

span.span: Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 結束交易範圍。

span.span: Ends the transaction scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會將標示交易範圍的結尾。Calling this method marks the end of the transaction scope. 如果建立交易物件並範圍內，呼叫物件嘗試認可交易，呼叫這個方法時。If the object created the transaction and was called on the scope, the object attempts to commit the transaction when this method is called. 在此情況下，交易處理這個方法會封鎖直到第一個階段已完成。In this case, this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一階段結束之後的所有資源管理員，並在交易中的登記皆已投票給交易結果而已永久地決定要認可或中止交易。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 第二階段一律是處理的非同步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，就只是已認可從給定的交易內的資料將會立即可用之後不使用另一筆交易，若要檢視此資料時不保證。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data. 使用 C#`using`建構可確保即使發生例外狀況，就會呼叫這個方法。The use of the C# `using` construction ensures that this method is called even if an exception occurs. 在呼叫這個方法後發生的例外狀況不太可能會影響異動。Exceptions that occur after calling this method may not affect the transaction. 這個方法也會還原環境交易給它的原始狀態。This method also restores the ambient transaction to it original state. A沒有實際上已認可交易時，就會擲回。A is thrown if the transaction is not actually committed. 因為這個方法會封鎖直到交易處理的第一個階段完成，您必須非常小心使用此方法，在 Windows Form (WinForm) 應用程式中或死結時可能會發生。Because this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur. 如果您呼叫內一個 WinForm 控制項事件 （例如按一下按鈕），這個方法，並使用同步方法來直接執行還在處理交易，某些 UI 工作 （例如變更色彩） 控制項將會發生死結。If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen. 這是因為方法是同步，背景工作執行緒，直到 UI 執行緒完成其作業。This is because the method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job. 不過，在我們的案例中，UI 執行緒也等待認可交易的背景工作執行緒。However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction. 結果是，它們都可以繼續作業，範圍會無限期等待認可完成。The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish. 您應該使用而非可能的情況下，因為它是非同步，因此較不容易發生死結。You should use rather than wherever possible, because it is asynchronous and thus less prone to deadlock. 如需有關如何使用此方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on how this method is used, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來定義參與交易的程式碼區塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to define a block of code to participate in a transaction. [!code-csharp[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/cs/ScopeWithSQL.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/vb/ScopeWithSQL.vb#1)]
